title: Gold Steadies as Traders Look to US Jobs Data for Rate-Cut Clues
description: Gold steadied, as traders weighed a stronger dollar and US economic data due Friday that will set the tone for interest-rate policy this year.
content: Gold steadied, as traders weighed a stronger dollar and US economic data due Friday that will set the tone for interest-rate policy this year.
